channel.title: HELP ME PLEASE [Client Crash] ADDED VIDEO!
channel.description: My problem is that every server and client I get even if there from the same person even on silabs client after i move twice it crashes the client. I have no idea what this could be so I really need your help! I had this in the server section but it didnt work To better explain myself better i present to you: My Video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VoxoSwcnQro

item.title: HELP ME PLEASE [Client Crash] ADDED VIDEO!
item.dc:creator: @iCreatedHorror Ryan
item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

Well, from what I just read, some clients/MoparScape clients can’t run off laptops, so if that’s what your trying to connect from, that may be why.

Thanks, Swinescape for posting that, and I’m glad I decided to read that post of you’rs.

Read full topic
